long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the built-in games from the Google Search game like the Snake Game, Solitaire, and other games. This removes the game by removing the HTML div that contains the game from the webpage with JavaScript. This extension can be force-added to Chrome browsers and Chromebooks through Google Admin without any extra configuration to block access to the games. After the page loads, the game will be removed from the page.
